This course does  not waste any time on explanations.

results.content: Nice course for those who are just entering SignalR world. As other reviewers said, the pronunciation of the instructor was a little confusing. Also, the course is very fast. Some points were missed. And because of this cost must be a little less.
results.content_html: Nice course for those who are just entering SignalR world. As other reviewers said, the pronunciation of the instructor was a little confusing. Also, the course is very fast. Some points were missed. And because of this cost must be a little less.

results.content: Gave me a good insight into the course. Can you recommend any others
results.content_html: Gave me a good insight into the course. Can you recommend any others

results.content: After finding scrappy pieces of code blocks, watching partially videos and reading various articles, I still had some questions about SignalR and how can I fully integrate it in my app. This course has helped me to really understand the main idea and the reason why I should include the real-time web functionality in my app. This is the best way to learn for me - by watching an app be built from scratch. And having in mind that English is not my native language, I want also to thank the instructor for the clear and easily understandable pronunciation! Thank you!
results.content_html: After finding scrappy pieces of code blocks, watching partially videos and reading various articles, I still had some questions about SignalR and how can I fully integrate it in my app. This course has helped me to really understand the main idea and the reason why I should include the real-time web functionality in my app. This is the best way to learn for me - by watching an app be built from scratch. And having in mind that English is not my native language, I want also to thank the instructor for the clear and easily understandable pronunciation! Thank you!
